reviewText: The movies are great, but silly me, I didn't check to see if the discs would play on a Region 1 DVD player.  Nope.  So if you're in the U.S. and have a Region 1 DVD player, you'll need to explore other options if you want these movies.
They never told me you couldn't play ot on US DVD players. Its still in the package
Insanely good zombie horror. The original is one of the best ever made. I am extremely satisfied with this collection.
